html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2016-09302016-10-21,  ECCC,  ,  , 
ActCanadian Environmental Protection Act, 1999
SubjectRegulations Amending the Export and Import of Hazardous Waste and Hazardous Recyclable Material Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the EXPORT AND IMPORT OF HAZARDOUS WASTE AND HAZARDOUS RECYCLABLE MATERIAL REGULATIONS in order to strengthen Canada's ability to meet two of its Basel obligations: the obligation to seek the consent of an importing or transit countries for any export from Canada of waste or recyclable material subject to the Basel Convention, including household waste; and the obligation to take or send back shipments that cannot be completed as planned.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2016-0273 Publication Date: 2016-11-02
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Regulations Amending the Export and Import of Hazardous Waste and Hazardous Recyclable Material Regulations
precis: Regulations Amending the EXPORT AND IMPORT OF HAZARDOUS WASTE AND HAZARDOUS RECYCLABLE MATERIAL REGULATIONS in order to strengthen Canada's ability to meet two of its Basel obligations: the obligation to seek the consent of an importing or transit countries for any export from Canada of waste or recyclable material subject to the Basel Convention, including household waste; and the obligation to take or send back shipments that cannot be completed as planned.
